gamerule.proximity.chatDistance.descript:
The maximum distance that players can hear chat messages from other players.
-1 to disable.
gamerule.proximity.commandDistance.descr:
The maximum distance that players can hear command messages from other players.
-1 to disable.
gamerule.proximity.mumbleDistance.descri:
The maximum distance that players can hear mumble messages from other players.
-1 to disable.
